beeper.description: All your chats in one app

chatterino.description: Chatterino is a chat client for Twitch chat that offers a clean and customizable interface for a better streaming experience.

discord.description: Discord is a popular communication platform with voice, video, and text chat, designed for gamers but used by a wide range of communities.

ferdium.description: Ferdium is a messaging application that combines multiple messaging services into a single app for easy management.

hexchat.description: HexChat is a free, open-source IRC (Internet Relay Chat) client with a graphical interface for easy communication.

jami.description: Jami is a secure and privacy-focused communication platform that offers audio and video calls, messaging, and file sharing.

linphone.description: Linphone is an open-source voice over IP (VoIPservice that allows for audio and video calls, messaging, and more.

matrix.description: Element is a client for Matrix; an open network for secure, decentralized communication.

qtox.description: QTox is a free and open-source messaging app that prioritizes user privacy and security in its design.

revolt.description: Find your community, connect with the world. Revolt is one of the best ways to stay connected with your friends and community without sacrificing any usability.

session.description: Session is a private and secure messaging app built on a decentralized network for user privacy and data protection.

signal.description: Signal is a privacy-focused messaging app that offers end-to-end encryption for secure and private communication.

slack.description: Slack is a collaboration hub that connects teams and facilitates communication through channels, messaging, and file sharing.

teams.description: Microsoft Teams is a collaboration platform that integrates with Office 365 and offers chat, video conferencing, file sharing, and more.

telegram.description: Telegram is a cloud-based instant messaging app known for its security features, speed, and simplicity.

thunderbird.description: Mozilla Thunderbird is a free and open-source email client, news client, and chat client with advanced features.

betterbird.description: Betterbird is a fork of Mozilla Thunderbird with additional features and bugfixes.

vesktop.description: A cross platform electron-based desktop app aiming to give you a snappier Discord experience with Vencord pre-installed.

viber.description: Viber is a free messaging and calling app with features like group chats, video calls, and more.

zoom.description: Zoom is a popular video conferencing and web conferencing service for online meetings, webinars, and collaborative projects.

zulip.description: Zulip is an open-source team collaboration tool with chat streams for productive and organized communication.
